org.restsql.core

Interface HttpRequestAttributes


  • public interface HttpRequestAttributes
    Contains HTTP request attributes. Always used by the service, and optionally by Java API clients.
    Author:
    Mark Sawers

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String DEFAULT_MEDIA_TYPE 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getClient()
      Returns client IP or hostname.
      String getMethod()
      Returns HTTP method.
      String getRequestBody()
      Returns request body, if any.
      String getRequestMediaType()
      Returns request media type.
      String getResponseMediaType()
      Returns response media type.
      String getUri()
      Returns URI.
      void setAttributes(String client, String method, String uri, String requestBody, String requestMediaType, String responseMediaType)
      Sets attributes of an HTTP request.
      void setResponseMediaType(String responseMediaType)
      Sets response media type.

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_MEDIA_TYPE

        static final String DEFAULT_MEDIA_TYPE
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getClient

        String getClient()
        Returns client IP or hostname.

      • getMethod

        String getMethod()
        Returns HTTP method.

      • getRequestBody

        String getRequestBody()
        Returns request body, if any.

      • getRequestMediaType

        String getRequestMediaType()
        Returns request media type.

      • getResponseMediaType

        String getResponseMediaType()
        Returns response media type.

      • getUri

        String getUri()
        Returns URI.

      • setAttributes

        void setAttributes(String client,
                 String method,
                 String uri,
                 String requestBody,
                 String requestMediaType,
                 String responseMediaType)
        Sets attributes of an HTTP request.
        Parameters:
        client - IP or host name
        method - HTTP method
        uri - request URI
        requestBody - request body
        requestMediaType - request body format, use internet media type e.g. application/xml
        responseMediaType - request body format, use internet media type e.g. application/xml

      • setResponseMediaType

        void setResponseMediaType(String responseMediaType)
        Sets response media type.
        Parameters:
        responseMediaType - request body format, use internet media type e.g. application/xml
